results.text: የሚጠያየቁም ሆነው ከፊላቸው ወደ ከፊሉ ይመጣሉ፡፡
results.translator: Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib

results.text: ከእነርሱ የሆነ ተናጋሪ ይላል «እኔ ጓደኛ ነበረኝ፡፡
results.translator: Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib

results.text: «በሞትንና ዐፈር አጥንቶችም በሆን ጊዜ እኛ በእርግጥ እንመረመራለን?» (የሚል)፡፡
results.translator: Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib

results.text: ይላል «በአላህ እምላለሁ፤ በእርግጥ ልታጠፋኝ ቀርበህ ነበር፡፡
results.translator: Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
